0.1.0.name: wordpress/shutter
0.1.0.description:
Shutter is a plugin and a suite of add-ons to help easily manage and share your photos.

Visit Shutter for more info and add-ons.

Get Involved

Shutter is an Open Source project. If you are a developer, make sure to check out and contribute to Shutter on the Shutter GitHub Repository.

Features include:

  • Fully Responsive (Dependent on Theme)
  • Creation of galleries with an unlimited amount of photos.
  • Control of image sizes for thumbnails and full size photos.
  • Shortcodes to embed galleries in various post types.
  • Hooks and a templating system for
